query.value:
SET @SourceName = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}';
SET @SourceSchema = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}';

-- SET @SourceName = 'customeraddress';
-- SET @SourceSchema = 'adventureworks' ;

select c.COLUMN_NAME as name,      
	c.COLUMN_NAME as description,     
	case  DATA_TYPE       
		WHEN 'bigint' THEN 'int64'      
        WHEN 'bit' THEN 'int64'   
        WHEN 'mediumint' THEN 'int64'   
        WHEN 'year' THEN 'int64'   
        WHEN 'smallint' THEN 'int64'   
        WHEN 'tinyint' THEN 'int64'   
        WHEN 'int' THEN 'int64'      
        WHEN 'timestamp' THEN 'int64'      
        WHEN 'datetime' THEN 'dateTime'      
        WHEN 'datetime2' THEN 'dateTime'
        WHEN 'decimal' THEN 'double'      
        WHEN 'float' THEN 'double'      
        WHEN 'double' THEN 'double'      
        WHEN 'real' THEN 'double'      
        WHEN 'money' THEN 'double'      
        WHEN 'numeric' THEN 'double'      
        else 'string'       
        END as dataType    
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c     
where c.TABLE_NAME = @SourceName   
	and c.TABLE_SCHEMA = @SourceSchema
    and c.COLUMN_NAME in (@{pipeline().parameters.WorkingColumnArray})

select * from `@{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}`.`@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}` WHERE @{pipeline().parameters.CreateTimestampColumnName} > 
  case when (select data_type from information_schema.columns where table_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}' and Table_Schema='@{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}' and column_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.CreateTimestampColumnName}') = 'timestamp' 
    then TIMESTAMPADD(SECOND, -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs}, "@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenCreateTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}")
        else date_add("@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenCreateTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}", Interval -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs} SECOND) END;

select * from `@{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}`.`@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}` 
WHERE @{pipeline().parameters.CreateTimestampColumnName} > 
  case when (select data_type from information_schema.columns where table_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}' and Table_Schema='@{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}' and column_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.CreateTimestampColumnName}') = 'timestamp' 
    then TIMESTAMPADD(SECOND, -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs}, "@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenCreateTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}")
        else date_add("@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenCreateTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}", Interval -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs} SECOND) END
    OR @{pipeline().parameters.EditTimestampColumnName} > 
  case when (select data_type from information_schema.columns where table_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}' and Table_Schema='@{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}' and column_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.EditTimestampColumnName}') = 'timestamp' 
    then TIMESTAMPADD(SECOND, -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs}, "@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenEditTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}")
        else date_add("@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenEditTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}", Interval -@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs} SECOND) END;
